title: Illustrated letter to Hamilton Basso
inscriptions: Winter Park Dear Mr. Basso./Jan 31. 1946. We were very glad to have a few lines from you. And to know that you are going away it will do/you back a lot of good. As in my own/case. I am feeling fine./It was a happy day in October when we mooved to Washington South "50". And/my brother was so happy to have a New York address. And a wonderful/place to work/Good luck/And best/wishes from us both /Charlie Prenderg/ast
